name: Zombie Frenzy (itch) (umn)
description:
The zombie apocalypse has started! You're the last survivor. Kill all the zombies or be killed!

Controls:
- Mouse                 : Move camera and aim.
- LMB Mouse     : Shoot / Reload.
- R                             : Reload.
- WASD                 : Move.

There are 3 levels, each with unique enemy and location.

Credit:
